thread.section_title: Super 8 San Bruno /SF Intl Arpt West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good accommodation beside the airport
thread.title_full: Good accommodation beside the airport - Review of Super 8 San Bruno /SF Intl Arpt West, San Bruno, CA - TripAdvisor

author: MikeCohen81
title: Good accommodation beside the airport
text:
The hotel is literally beside the airport, just 5 mins away by car. All in, it's a clean, comfortable hotel for the price you pay. Within minutes away is a mall The Tanforan, lots of restaurants, Safeway, Walgreen (just next door), etc. Really convenient for a short stay by SFO.
Room Tip: Clean and comfortable hotel beside SFO See more room tips Green Features: There is a recycling bin in the room. You can skip the towel washing.
